event.name: Junkyard Guild War
event.desc: Compete with your Guild to earn Victory Points! Win wars to climb the ranks, and increase your Guild's total points to compete for exclusive rewards! All enemies start with a Tower card in play.

clash.name: Guild War Placements
clash.reward_desc_label: Your final rankings in the placement will determine your guild's starting rank in the War.
clash.desc: Defeat enemies to increase your guild rank! Your final ranking will determine your guild's starting rank in the war. All enemies start with a Tower card in play. Attacks do not recharge!

event.rank_note: Victory Points are earned based on your placement in Matching at the end of each war.
event.standings_note: Rewards are determined by Victory Points. Victory Points are earned each war based on your Matching placement.

event_reward.desc: Complete the War at Rank 1 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 3 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 5 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 5 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 7 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 10 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 15 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 20 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 40 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 70 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 100 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 150 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 250 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 350 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 500 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 1000 or higher.
Complete the War at Rank 2000 or higher.

event.name: TEST Guild War
event.desc: We are testing fixes to recent issues with Guild War. Please bear with us so that we can ensure the stability of the next war.

clash.reward_desc_label: Your final rankings in the placement will determine your guild's starting rank in the War.

event.rank_note: Victory Points are earned based on your placement in Matching at the end of each war.
event.standings_note: Rewards are determined by Victory Points. Victory Points are earned each war based on your Matching placement.

event_reward.desc: Complete the War at Rank 1 or higher.
